TopicTitle: Hadmen Kerman [KSP Movie] COMMING IN SPRING 2021

Articles.Content:
Directer Messages 1:
Hadmen Kerman is a KSP Movie coming up soon. The film will feature a Kerbal named Hadmen Kerman. He will rescue a crew from Eeloo’s surface and fulfill’s Kerbalkind’s greatest goal. Of going everywhere in the Kerbol system.  This film will be coming in  SPRING of 2021. Please not though that since the movie is in an early stage of planning things may change.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qeG08-KCJqs

Above is a link to a YouTube video about the films storyline. Please subscribe to my channel for more information and updates.

Edited March 14, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal

Derector Message 2:

Filming started today. The footage looks great. It looks like one of Matt Lowne's first KSP movies though...
